h1_title: How to Claim Deluxe Edition Items
content: If you already have or are considering upgrading to the Deluxe Edition of Black Myth: Wukong, you might be wondering how to claim the Deluxe Edition Items that come with it. Thankfully, there's an easy way in-game to claim your bonus loot and on this page, we'll talk you through how to do it.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "How_to_Claim_Deluxe_Edition_Items.md", under the primary heading "How to Claim Deluxe Edition Items". The content is presented below:

If you already have or are considering upgrading to the Deluxe Edition of Black Myth: Wukong, you might be wondering how to claim the Deluxe Edition Items that come with it. Thankfully, there's an easy way in-game to claim your bonus loot and on this page, we'll talk you through how to do it.
